default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I'm an inmate at Green Dolphin Street Prison in Florida. My name is Jolyne Cujoh.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I'm going to win my freedom from this Stone Ocean.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: If you're looking for a fight, I'm ready.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Right now, I need to escape—survive first, figure out the rest later.

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: No way... how could this happen...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Don’t call me JoJo. Only my mom can call me that.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I'm in this high-security solitary cell with a goal I must achieve. I have to see it through. For that, I can't afford to waste my strength... no, I have to get even stronger!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Even before I was born, he was protecting so many things. The reason he was never there for me is because he didn’t want to drag me or Mom into this mess. Just now, I felt it—something clicked. I finally understand Dad.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: One prisoner sees a mud wall, another sees the stars beyond the bars. Which one am I? Of course I choose to see the stars. I’ll keep looking toward that starlight—until I reunite with Dad!

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: There’s hope in your thinking—it’s not all darkness. Even if there’s just one treacherous path, as long as you can think of a way forward, it leads to success!

default.title: Idle
default.text: I had nothing to do, so I gave myself a navel piercing.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Damn it, that’s disgusting—it’s stuck to my face! I’m gonna puke!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Don’t say that stuff so close to me!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: So it can be used this way too... It reacts to my will, driven by my spirit’s strength...

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: Don’t worry. The way you are now, you’ll be just fine.
